Name: Money Penny
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dry gin soured with a splash of fresh grapefruit juice and balanced with the merest touch of sugar.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered in 2010 at the Blue Owl in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Money Penny contains 185 calories
